content:
Here's my response as the user:

"Good point about the denim jacket! I think I'll go with the trench coat instead. My trench coat is a classic, belted design with a fitted silhouette. It's a beige color that will complement the neutral tones in the outfit nicely. I'm thinking of belting it to accentuate my waist and create a more defined shape.

I'm also wondering about the size of the bag. Should I carry it by the handles or use the shoulder strap? I want to make sure I'm showing off the bag in the best way possible."

Let me know your thoughts!
